rows.label: bf04120140_0010
rows.name:
If we're on the right track,
he should be around here, yeah?

rows.label: bf04120140_0020
rows.name:
Thief using Umon's workshop
as hideout...

rows.label: bf04120140_0030
rows.name: I never dream of such a thing!

rows.label: bf04120140_0040
rows.name:
That's him.
Let's surround them so he can't run.

rows.label: bf04120140_0070
rows.name: Kid! You sure led us on a merry chase.

rows.label: bf04120140_0080
rows.name: You've wasted a lot of our time, you know.

rows.label: bf04120140_0100
rows.name:
Look at you. You're only kids.
Why don't you just give back what you took?

rows.label: bf04120140_0110
rows.name: We'd rather not hurt you or anything.

rows.label: bf04120140_0130
rows.name: Oi, I'll have you know I work for a living.

rows.label: bf04120140_0160
rows.name: The Core Crystal is ours now!

rows.label: bf04120140_0170
rows.name:
If you want it so bad, you'll
have to take it by force!

rows.label: bf04120140_0180
rows.name:
Well, nothing for it, I guess.
All right! Let's go!
